title: Therapeutic use of music in neurological disorders: A concise narrative review
content:

Author(s): Medha Ramaswamy, Johann Laji Philip, Vijayan Priya, Snigdha Priyadarshini, Meenakshi Ramasamy, G.C. Jeevitha, Darin Mansor Mathkor, Shafiul Haque, Fatemeh Dabaghzadeh, Pratik Bhattacharya, Faraz Ahmad
